Love is one of the most common themes in art. The majority of modern movies have a love story and most pop music is about love.
 
Love is one of the most common themes in art. The majority of modern movies have a love story and most pop music is about love.
  +   +
Love is a beautiful thing. It is when two people are joined together, and feel for each other unconditionally, they love you no matter what, rain or shine. They say, 'I love you' and when one person sees another they feel all fuzzy inside and when they think of each other it's like their soul is electrocuted from happiness. Being without a person you love is hard, but you can get through it :)
     
==Defining love==
